channel.title: How to make NPCS (Not just place existing ones,making new 1s) & editing minimap?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make entirely new npcs, like npc 3800 and 3801 as a new shopkeeper that buys items in smithing areas? Also does anyone know how to edit the minimap, to add icons for the new shops? (and take out extra quest isons :P) If there is already a topic could you poas a link? cuz i looked and all the posts about meking shops were al editing previous shops :( Im sure this would also hwlp many people making there servers.
THX for your time :D
